about_the_game:
The year is 198X,

                                               The powers that be have gone silent,

                                    Humanity is unrestrained, the party will never stop.

                                                 Vice grips every corner of the city,

                                                   Indulgence is at an all-time high,

                                                    A new kind of doctrine festers.

RitualRX is a brutally violent, blisteringly fast, adrenaline-pumping shooter set within a pastel paradise ruled by cults. Control a group of excommunicated sinners as you shoot, slash, and slaughter your way through a city where ritual is prescribed and the only treatment administered is an overdose of lead.

Lightning fast and brutal combat where everything is a weapon. Kick down doors and cave in skulls, throw everything and tackle enemies- ignite, cut, and blast your way through intricate sandbox-like levels as you master increasingly brutal methods of dispatching your foes.

Control a group of excommunicated sinners. A dishonored SWAT officer, a cultist detective, a vampiric vigilante, and more- all bound to unending violence by dark forces. Step into their shoes, mastering their unique abilities and traits; charge forward and impale with lethal antlers, stab and throw with a razor-sharp tail, even control time and rewrite history. Each blessing is not without it's curses however; A reliance on blood, an unpaid deal with arcane forces, all are at the mercy of their own sins.

content_descriptors.notes: RitualRX contains hyperbolic amounts of violence and gore against enemies both inhuman and not. Drug and alcohol use is both depicted and partaken in within the narrative, as well as implications of self-harm and generally distressing topics.
